mapper.select: select count(*) from intf_soc_ipbaolumian where system_id in(select id from intf_soc_djxt where company_id=#{deptId})

SELECT table4.company_id AS deptId, table5.dept_name AS deptName, total AS num FROM ( SELECT company_id, SUM ( num ) AS total FROM ( SELECT table1.systemId, table1.num, table2.businessname_level, table2.company_id FROM ( SELECT system_id AS systemId, COUNT ( 1 ) AS num FROM aqmh.intf_soc_ipbaolumian GROUP BY system_id ) AS table1 LEFT JOIN aqmh.intf_soc_djxt table2 ON table1.systemId = table2.id ) AS table3 WHERE company_id != 'null' GROUP BY company_id ) AS table4 LEFT JOIN aqmh.dept_info AS table5 ON table4.company_id = table5.dept_id ORDER BY total DESC
